com.ihordev.holidays.core.util

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihordev.holidays.core.util.Date

  • public class Date
extends Object

    A class that represents a calendar date. It's based on gregorian calendar and fact that 1 january of 1900 year is a monday.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static Date of(String date)
        Constructs an instance from date specified as string. String must be in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format;
        Parameters:
        date - the date as string in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format
        Returns:
        a new instance of this class

                      int month,

        Parameters:
        year - the year of date
        month - the month of date
        dayOfMonth - the day of month of date
